umikochannart        My Muse's are: 
leisurelypanda & 
cronchevans              ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/A217973       (Compromise where you can. Where you can't, don't. Even if everyone is telling you that something wrong is something right. Even if the whole world is telling you to move, it is your duty to plant yourself like a tree, look them in the eye, and say 'No, you move'.)

tags: how long is this thing gonna be
summary: Digging into the Past Being Thalia Chapter 21 By devikavernando & avenger-nerd-mom AU Fan Fiction In the sequel to Educating...
caption:
Digging into the Past

Being Thalia

Chapter 21

By devikavernando & avenger-nerd-mom

AU Fan Fiction

In the sequel to Educating Thalia, the lovely Thalia Bareo is growing up, making her own way in the world after losing both men she loved, Professors Chris Evans and Tom Hiddleston. The sassy full-figured Puerto Rican girl from Chicago holds down a job in Madrid as she tries to deal with the real world. She continues her studies and freelances as a consultant for museums around the world. Being Thalia updates are posted on Wednesdays and Sundays.

Warning: As a whole, this work contains adult content. If you proceed you have agreed that you are willing to see such content. Each chapter will not be coded with individual warnings. The overall story contains no hidden triggers.

If you are new to the series and characters, click here to the beginning of Educating Thalia.

If you are looking for other stories in the sequel, click here for the beginning of Being Thalia

Gif created from images found on Pinterest

Word Count: 2252

Summary: After a long day together at the museum, Tom and Thalia each spend time digging up old memories.

Previous Chapter, Museum Musings

September 2021

Unable to convince her to join him for dinner, Tom left Thalia at her office, under the guise that she had daily reports to finish. The late summer air is warm and inviting, so Tom decides to meander the city, lost in his thoughts. Taking off his jacket, he casually drapes it over his arm, clutching it to his side. He takes a deep breath, letting his muscles relax from the long day. Being so near her, but not being able to have her had put a harsh strain on his body, and he’s almost relieved she turned down his offer.

He watches a young family cross the street in front of him, and he feels a pang of… something. He can’t put a name to the feeling. Loss? Guilt? Hope?

Could that be him one day? A father, pushing a stroller while a little one toddles ahead, the mother rushing to keep up. Thalia. Would she even want that? He brushes his hand roughly across his forehead. She’s older now, her early thirties. Does she want to have children? It was something they never discussed, actually.

“You fucker, Hiddleston,” he murmurs aloud, crossing to the other side of the street, watching for traffic. She’d said it the other day, at the park, that she’d only been his sexual partner. On the phone, she’d said she felt he’d taken advantage of her. That was her truth, her view. He’d been such a hard, British arse, keeping his emotions in check, she’d never known he truly loved her, would have given anything for her.

No wonder she sought out Evans, and his affections. Bloody hell, the American had been right all along.

Click here to continue reading

Reader Tags under the cut

list in abc order- updated March 3


I’m on my work computer. I have no idea why these are bold!

summary: Chris Evans Has Ignited a Celebrity Debate Over the Correct Ranking of These Chips
title: Chris Evans Has Ignited a Celebrity Debate Over the Correct Ranking of These Chips
description:
Welcome to the Battle of the Chips: Celebrity Edition.

A video posted on social media this link opens in a new tab by comedian Kevin Fredericks on Sunday has Twitter—and a number of celebrities—up in arms. In the clip, Fredericks is arguing with friends over the correct ranking of the chips in a Frito-Lay variety pack made up of Cool Ranch Doritos, Nacho Cheese Doritos, Cheetos, Fritos, BBQ Lays, and Original Lays. He then asked Twitter to decide for themselves.

Chris Evans was one of the first stars to take on the daunting task: “The correct answer is: 1. Cool ranch 2. Cheetos 3. Nacho cheese Doritos 4. Fritos 5. BBQ lays 6. Original lays. I will not be taking questions.”

His controversial answer sparked dozens of responses from celebrities like Octavia Spencer, Leslie Jones…

“dude? seriously?????? Now you know cheetos is top dawg!!!!” wrote Spencer, prompting Evans to defend his choices.

“Look, this wasn’t easy for me,” wrote the Avengers star. “But the bottom line is, I can put in more work on a bag of cool ranch than any other chip. Let’s just acknowledge their dominance and move on. I really don’t want this to affect our friendship.”

With great power comes great responsibility.

reblog.comment:
Welcome to the Battle of the Chips: Celebrity Edition.

A video posted on social media this link opens in a new tab by comedian Kevin Fredericks on Sunday has Twitter—and a number of celebrities—up in arms. In the clip, Fredericks is arguing with friends over the correct ranking of the chips in a Frito-Lay variety pack made up of Cool Ranch Doritos, Nacho Cheese Doritos, Cheetos, Fritos, BBQ Lays, and Original Lays. He then asked Twitter to decide for themselves.

Chris Evans was one of the first stars to take on the daunting task: “The correct answer is: 1. Cool ranch 2. Cheetos 3. Nacho cheese Doritos 4. Fritos 5. BBQ lays 6. Original lays. I will not be taking questions.”

His controversial answer sparked dozens of responses from celebrities like Octavia Spencer, Leslie Jones…

“dude? seriously?????? Now you know cheetos is top dawg!!!!” wrote Spencer, prompting Evans to defend his choices.

“Look, this wasn’t easy for me,” wrote the Avengers star. “But the bottom line is, I can put in more work on a bag of cool ranch than any other chip. Let’s just acknowledge their dominance and move on. I really don’t want this to affect our friendship.”

With great power comes great responsibility.

They are tagged under Avengers: Endgame spoilers and Avengers: Endgame - About Me - - My Masterlist - https://all-things-marvel-related.tumblr.com/post/184043672905/my-masterlist - List of Marvel Characters I write for - https://all-things-marvel-related.tumblr.com/characters - My multiple part Prompt List - https://all-things-marvel-related.tumblr.com/prompt-list - My tag lists -https://all-things-marvel-related.tumblr.com/tag-lists - REQUESTS ARE OPEN!!!!!!!

summary: Steve Rogers - Morning Run (How You Meet)
title: Steve Rogers - Morning Run (How You Meet)
body:
(Set is mine!!!! I made it on combyne!!!!! (It’s an app that I have on my phone!!! It’s kind of like Polyvore, but not really!))

You’re woken up by your Smooth-faced Pyrenean Shepherd 

(^ This dog is so Pretty!!! Who else wants to own a dog like this?! Because I want to own one now!!!)

(D/N) (Dogs name) jumping on the bed and licking your face to wake you up. You laugh as you push her/him away from you. “Alright (D/N). I’m up.” you say giggling. You stretch before turning to her/him as she/he looks up at you with expectant blue eyes. “You want to go out on a run don’t you?” you ask her/him. She/He barks while wagging her/his tail excitedly making you grin. “Alright. Come on.” you say as you get up from your bed and exit the room with (D/N) right behind you. As you make breakfast for yourself you give (D/N) her/his food so you don’t have to feed her/him after your morning run. 

You’ve lived in Washington D.C. for about 4 years now and you love your small yet roomy apartment near all of the Memorial Parks where you always do your morning runs. It’s the perfect apartment for just you and (D/N) since you’ve been without a boyfriend for about a year now. Your last boyfriend did live with you, but after 6 months of dating him you had found out from a friend that he was cheating on you, so you broke things off with him and have been single ever since, not really looking for a new boyfriend. After eating breakfast you go back to your room to change into something more suitable for running around in instead of your pajamas that you’re currently wearing. You change into this:

(Also made this ^ set on combyne!!!!)

before grabbing your earbuds and your phone to listen to music as you run. You exit your room to see (D/N) holding her/his leash in her mouth. You smile as she tilts her/his head to the side while she’s/he’s looking up at you. You smile as you kneel in front of her/him clipping the hook to her collar. “Alright (D/N), let’s go.” you say as you lead her/him to the door and out of the apartment. You get to the park but before you start running you stop by a bench to stretch out your muscles and put your earbuds in so you can listen to your music. As you stretch you see 2 guys jogging around the lake. It seems that their racing each other which makes you smirk slightly since the muscular blonde is clearly winning, while the other is struggling to keep up. A few minutes later you place 1 of your earbuds in, press play on your playlist as you grab (D/N)’s leash. “Come on, (D/N).” you say to her. She eagerly starts trotting in front of you making you smile as you put your phone in your pocket.

As you and (D/N) jog around the lake you see the muscular blond pass you twice. ‘How is he still not out of breath?’ You wonder as you slow to a stop running out of breath. (D/N) looks back at you as if wondering ‘Why did you stop?’ You smile at her/him as you sit down in the bench behind you. She/He walks up to you and sits down putting her/his head on your knee. “Good girl/boy.” you smile as you pet her head. You continue to sit on the bench until you start regaining your breath again, but before you can get up from the bench (D/N)’s ears perk up and she/he bolts to where the muscular blonde is running. “(D/N)! No!” you yell as you jump up from the bench. She/He bolts toward the blonde making him stop in his tracks. “(D/N)!” you say again but she/he runs into him making him chuckle as he pets her/him. You slowly walk up to him and watch him pet her/him compassionately. He looks up at you with beautiful blue eyes. “I assume she’s/he’s yours?” he asks you as he grabs (D/N)’s leash from the ground and hands it to you. You nod. “Yes. She/He is. I don’t know what got into her/him, she/he doesn’t usually do this.” you say as Bella sits next to you panting slightly from being so excited. “It’s alright.” he smiles. “I needed to take a break anyway.”

It’s silent for a moment before he speaks up again. “So, you live around here? I’ve seen you around the park before.” he says. You nod. “Yeah. I have a small apartment not from here.” you say pointing in the direction of your apartment building. “What about you?” you ask. He shrugs. “I’ve been living here for a couple of months but I’ve been looking for another apartment in a different part of the city.” he says. “Well, my apartment building has a few empty apartments you could check out sometime.” you say. He smiles. “I might just do that.” You smile back at him and then look down at (D/N). “Want to head home now, (D/N)?” you ask her/him. She/Him looks up at you and barks happily. You look back up at the blonde standing in front of you. “Well, I should go back home now. It was really nice meeting you…” you say but stop since you don’t know his name. “Steve.” he says giving you his hand to shake. You smile and shake his hand. “Well, it was very nice meeting you Steve. My name’s (Y/N) by the way.” you say. He smiles. “Nice to meet you.”

“Hey, Steve!” a voice calls from behind Steve making him turn around to see the man he was jogging with earlier running toward the 2 of you. “Well, I’m going to go now.” you say to him making Steve turn to you again. “Maybe I’ll see you around?” you ask him. He smiles and nods at you. “Yeah. I would like that.” he says. You smile and wave goodbye to him before turning around, leading (D/N) back home.

As you walk back home you feel eyes on you. You turn back and see Steve staring at you. Once your (e/c) eyes meet his blue ones he turns away blushing heavily making you do the same. You just hope you’ll see him again. Hopefully in the near future.

Tag list:

@lotus-eyedindiangoddess @snoozys @0-0-0-0-0-0-0-7 @mandywholock1980 @fiveisadorable

You look back up at the blonde standing in front of you. “Well, I should go back home now. It was really nice meeting you…” you say but stop since you don’t know his name. “Steve.” he says giving you his hand to shake. You smile and shake his hand. “Well, it was very nice meeting you Steve. My name’s (Y/N) by the way.” you say. He smiles. “Nice to meet you.”

“Hey, Steve!” a voice calls from behind Steve making him turn around to see the man he was jogging with earlier running toward the 2 of you. “Well, I’m going to go now.” you say to him making Steve turn to you again. “Maybe I’ll see you around?” you ask him. He smiles and nods at you. “Yeah. I would like that.” he says. You smile and wave goodbye to him before turning around, leading (D/N) back home.

As you walk back home you feel eyes on you. You turn back and see Steve staring at you. Once your (e/c) eyes meet his blue ones he turns away blushing heavily making you do the same. You just hope you’ll see him again. Hopefully in the near future.

Tag list:

@lotus-eyedindiangoddess @snoozys @0-0-0-0-0-0-0-7 @mandywholock1980 @fiveisadorable
trail.content_abstract:
(Set is mine!!!! I made it on combyne!!!!! (It’s an app that I have on my phone!!! It’s kind of like Polyvore, but not really!))

You’re woken up by your Smooth-faced Pyrenean Shepherd 

(^ This dog is so Pretty!!! Who else wants to own a dog like this?! Because I want to own one now!!!)

(D/N) (Dogs name) jumping on the bed and licking your face to wake you up. You laugh as you push her/him away from you. “Alright (D/N). I’m up.” you say giggling. You stretch before turning to her/him as she/he looks up at you with expectant blue eyes. “You want to go out on a run don’t you?” you ask her/him. She/He barks while wagging her/his tail excitedly making you grin. “Alright. Come on.” you say as you get up from your bed and exit the room with (D/N) right behind you. As you make breakfast for yourself you give (D/N) her/his food so you don’t have to feed her/him after your morning run.
